content.full_text: Marriage Entry for Abraham Lincoln and Mary Todd, 4 November 18421
paragraphs: Marriage Entry for Abraham Lincoln and Mary Todd, 4 November 18421

footnotes.text:
1The entry for Abraham Lincoln and Mary Todd’s wedding is written on the third line
                  of pages 276-77 of the parish register ofProtestant Episcopal ChurchofSpringfield, of whichCharles Dresserwas the rector. We have here transcribed the headings at the top of the page as well
                  as the Lincolns' entry.
2“Rev Charles Dresser” was written on the first line of this page.

structured_content.text: Marriage Entry for Abraham Lincoln and Mary Todd, 4 November 18421
